thread.title: North American Risk Services, Inc. Appoints Director of Catastrophe and Service Partnership Management

author: cnbc.com
title: North American Risk Services, Inc. Appoints Director of Catastrophe and Service Partnership Management
text:
ORLANDO, Fla.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- North American Risk Services, Inc. ( NARS ) has hired Randy Wallace as its Director of Catastrophe and Service Partnership Management. In this role, Randy will oversee NARS’ organizational response in the event of a catastrophic event (CAT), test capabilities, and enhance procedures. Based in the Irving, TX office, he will lead a CAT Command Center which will house dedicated CAT adjusters.
“As our team reflected on the 2017 CAT season, we felt that we should dedicate more resources to CAT handling and to separate it completely from our daily claims operations. We are pleased to have someone with Randy’s level of expertise to refine our procedures and to facilitate the best possible response to any catastrophe,” said Robert Ruryk, NARS President and CEO.
Over Randy’s 26-year career, he has served as a property adjuster and supervisor for large insurance carriers. As Catastrophe Line Manager for Travelers, Randy was involved in redesigning their National Catastrophe Response Team, growing it from 30 CAT adjusters to over 200. More recently, Randy served as the Director of Property Claims at AmTrust Financial.
Randy shared, “I chose the property line of business as my career over 25 years ago and, for the last 15 years, CAT has been my passion. My goal is to enhance the deployment and CAT management strategies already in place at NARS, while keeping the customer experience at the forefront.”
Randy has additional experience in Training, Quality Assurance, and Branch Management. He received a Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration from the University of North Texas.
About NARS
North American Risk Services, Inc. (NARS) is a privately held, national third-party claims administrator dedicated to providing comprehensive claims and insurance-related services to insurers, brokerages, managing general agencies, reinsurers, and self-insured funds. NARS prides itself on strong customer service, depth of insurance and claims knowledge, and ability to tailor every aspect of claims administration to fit client needs. With a diverse portfolio of programs across many industries and jurisdictions, NARS has dedicated units for: Construction Defect, General and Professional Liability, Property, Transportation, Workers’ Compensation, Recovery, Special Investigations and Catastrophe Management. Please visit www.narisk.com to learn more.
